Cheulyoung Park

Master's Student of KSE @ KAIST

View the Project on GitHub cheulyop/cheulyop.github.io

About

I’m interested in the application of machine learning in affect detection through physiological sensing. I aspire to better understand our decisions and behaviors in social contexts involving interpersonal interactions. Broadly, I’m interested in topics including privacy, trust, and deception.

My research so far has been in the domain of human-computer interaction. As a member of Interactive Computing Lab headed by Prof. Uichin Lee, I’m currently working on the SuggestBot project that aims to develop a context-aware smart interaction service platform, with Auk Kim, Suwon Kang, and Narae Cha.
